column1: Orange HRM-Employee Management-Editing Employee Details
column27: This test case validates that an admin user can modify the details of an existing employee
column54:
* The system should successfully update the employee’s details.
* The modified details (e.g., updated First Name or Job Title) should be reflected in the employee list or profile.
* A success message should be displayed after saving.
column68:
# Log in to the [OrangeHRM|https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login] system as an admin user.
# click on PIM 
# click on edit  ( pen icon )
# Modify the employee’s details (e.g., change the First Name or Job Title).
# Click the "Save" button to save the changes.
# Refresh the employee list or revisit the employee’s profile to verify the updated details.

column1: Orange HRM-Login Functionality-Verify Access to Dashboard Is Blocked After Logout
column27: This test case checks that once the user logs out, trying to go back using the browser should not allow access to the dashboard or any protected pages. This verifies session expiry.
column54:
The system should not show the dashboard again.

# Once redirected to the login page, press the browser *Back* button.
